description: Explore how Arbitrum bridges blockchain innovation with open source licensing, enhancing Ethereum scalability and ensuring legal compliance. Learn about its licensing strategies and their impacts on security, interoperability, and community development.
keywords: Arbitrum, open source licensing, Ethereum, blockchain, license compatibility, scalability, GPL, MIT, Apache 2.0, dual licensing, legal frameworks, open source community, interoperability, security
title: Arbitrum and Open Source License Compatibility: Bridging Innovation and Legal Frameworks
